name: Turkey and Apple Sandwiches With Maple Mayonnaise
description: Here’s a new fall classic for a young student’s lunch box: a fresh sandwich of turkey and apple, bound together with mayonnaise spiked with maple syrup. For a kick, swirl a little Sriracha sauce into the mayonnaise.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound turkey or smoked turkey, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise and maple syrup; spread on 4 slices of bread, going all the way to the edges. Top with the turkey and apple slices and then with the remaining bread.
